meanings.sent1: The road was the longest route to take.
meanings.sent2: The Great Wall of China is one of the longest man-made structures.
meanings.sent3: The cat took the longest path to catch the mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was the longest river flowing down her back.
meanings.sent5: The longest snake in the world can reach over 30 feet in length.

meanings.definition: For the most extended period of time.
meanings.sent1: She waited the longest for her friend to arrive.
meanings.sent2: He held his breath the longest underwater.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel chattered the longest in the tree.
meanings.sent4: The candle burned the longest during the power outage.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display lasted the longest compared to the others.

meanings.definition: To a great extent in time.
meanings.sent1: She longested for the days when they were together.
meanings.sent2: He longested to travel the world and see new places.
meanings.sent3: The child longested to stay up past bedtime.
meanings.sent4: The student longested for summer break to arrive.
meanings.sent5: The explorer longested to reach the peak of the mountain.
